NYC-based AI video startup Runway raised a $315M Series E led by General Atlantic, a source says at a $5.3B valuation, and plans to build AI world models  —  The AI industry just got another indicator that the future lies beyond words alone.  —  On Tuesday, video AI firm Runway announced a $315 million Series E funding round.

items.title: Apple’s 11-inch 1TB M5 iPad Pro hits Amazon all-time low today at $150 off
items.summary:
We have caught a couple of opportunities to land the more affordable 13-inch M5 iPad Pro models at $150 off in new condition, however the 11-inch models have rarely sold for better than $100 off. While that remains the case on the 256GB and 512GB storage options at the moment, Amazon is serving up a new all-time low on the 11-inch 1TB model today at $150 off the list price.

items.title: Samsung’s ViewFinity S70D 37-inch 4K HDR monitor is an absolute steal at $250 (All-time low)
items.summary:
As part of its wider Mega Deal Zone sale event, B&H is offering Samsung’s 37-inch ViewFinity S70D 4K HDR monitor in black for $249.99 shipped with a $30 coupon that auto-applies during checkout. This is regularly a $500 display that has lately been fetching $400 at Amazon and Samsung’s online store. It once dropped to $280 at B&H as part of the retailer’s Black Friday sale, but today’s offer beats that with an additional $30 discount. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this monitor, and it’s an absolute steal if you’re in the market to buy a 4K monitor for your workstation. Head below for more details.

But considering how capable the new Ultra 2 still is, we wanted to make sure this offer courtesy of a top-rated eBay seller was on your radar – this “excellent – refurbished” black Ultra 2 is over $400 off the list price right now. The same watch in Amazon Renewed Premium condition with a 1-year warranty is down at $459 shipped.

We saw this model drop to $50 last year during the Black Friday sale, and today’s deal marks the return of that with a $40 discount on its usual going rate. items.title: Huge B&H 3-day Mega Sale event now live: Cameras, computers, SSDs, accessories, more from just $2
items.summary:
Hot on the heels of Best Buy’s President’s Day sale, B&H has now kicked off its first sale event of the year. The retailer’s new 3-day Mega Deal Zone sale offers some notable markdowns on MacBooks, workstation monitors, camera gear, and more, and the prices for the items included in the sale start at just $1.99 shipped. B&H is also offering some deals on SSDs at the moment, which is definitely a surprise considering how the prices have been steadily increasing lately as part of the global memory shortage. All of the current deals are live on the retailer’s landing page, and you’ll find more details along with a few of our favorites highlighted below.

items.summary:
Velotric has launched its Valentine’s Day sale promotions with up to $512 savings across a selection of e-bikes (plus an additional $150 savings off your total order when buying two models), with the biggest deal amongst the bunch being on the T1 ST Plus Lightweight Urban e-bike with $162 in FREE gear at $1,299 shipped. Normally, this e-bike with this bundled gear would cost you $1,811 without any savings, with this being one of the best price cuts and bundle deals on this particular model over the last year, beaten out by the 3-day Christmas flash sale that gave the e-bike a range extender at this same rate. You’ll be getting $512 in total savings here, with the e-bike landing at the best price we have tracked over the last year. Head below to learn more about it and the other Valentine’s Day deals we’re currently seeing.

more…

items.title: Score Vantrue’s N5S 4-channel 360-degree dash cam with up to 2.7K resolution at $320 (Reg. $400), more from $200
items.summary:
By way of the official Vantrue Amazon storefront, you can pick up the brand’s new N5S 4-Channel 360-Degree Dash Cam at $319.99 shipped, after clipping the on-page 20% off coupon, which happens to also match the price we’re seeing from the direct website. Normally going for $400 at full price since hitting the market in July, we’ve seen previous discounts go as low as $280, which was last seen during Black Friday sales in November. While it’s gone that low in the past, you’re still getting a solid $80 markdown here that marks the first of its 2026 discounts, landing it at the third-lowest price that we have tracked. As a cheaper alternative that still provides external and internal coverage of your vehicle, you can find the N4S 3-Channel Dash Cam system down at $199.99 shipped, after clipping the on-page 20% off coupon.

items.title: Upgrade to 360-degree solar-charging security with Anker’s SoloCam S340 multi-cam kits starting from a $350 low
items.summary:
Through its official eufy Amazon storefront, Anker is offering its Security SoloCam S340 2-Cam Kit (with HomeBase 3) at $349.98 shipped, which happens to match the sale pricing we’re seeing directly from the brand’s website, while the more comprehensive 4-Cam Kit (with HomeBase 3) is down at $599.99 shipped, and also matching the price from the direct website. These two security packages carry $550 and $1,030 MSRPs, but you can more often find them starting around $500 and $900 on average, with discounts having taken the 2-cam kit to this same low price (last seen during Christmas sales) and the 4-cam kit to $550. That means you’re getting either an all-time low for the 2-cam setup or the second-best price for the 4-cam kit, courtesy of the $150 and $300 markdowns from the going rates ($200 and $430 off the MSRPs).
